Dhillon,

I haven't used Restlet, but I've used Jersey and Rails a fair bit=
.
Both work well and have different strengths and weaknesses. If I were
goi=
ng to write a full on API (without a UI) I'd probably go with
Jersey. It ha=
s good separation, and does a lot of the tedious stuff
for you (thinking co=
ntent negotiation, URI construction, etc.).

Thanks!
Brandon

On Wed, Nov 2=
5, 2009 at 5:28 AM, dhillon_sjsu <narpal.dhillon@...> wrote:
> Hello
=
